title: Diablo 4's authentication servers are down, preventing players from logging in
description: Blizzard acknowledges a problem is "affecting [its] authentication servers, which may result in failed or slow login attempts".

title: Can't access your Street Fighter 6 deluxe or ultimate edition extras? Here's a workaround
description: Street Fighter 6 players are struggling to access their premium items but some think they've found a workaround.

title: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic 2 - The Sith Lords Restored Content DLC is canceled on Switch
description: Asypr says the highly-anticipated KOTOR Restored Content DLC will "not be moving forward for release".

title: Gmail is adding more AI to help you find important emails faster
description: Lots of emails to sift through? The Gmail mobile apps can now help you sort through them more quickly.

title: Microsoft says it’s curtains for Cortana in Windows 11 (and 10) – but that’s no surprise
description: Did anyone still use Cortana? Well, if you did, the digital assistant won’t be around in Windows later in 2023.

title: It’s time for Windows Media Player to take on Apple Music for WWDC
description: Windows and Mac have always been in some kind of battle - but this time the battleground is a musical one.

title: Dodgy Champions League final streaming could be a serious own goal
description: Cybercriminals look to be targeting football fans as the Champions League final approaches.

title: Latest Apple VR headset leak gives us clues about how it might get used
description: There's apparently now a hands-on area at Apple Park for the VR headset due to launch on June 5.

title: This new malware campaign can hijack your Gmail or Outlook email account
description: Campaign mostly targets the Spanish-speaking community, but Gmail and Outlook users everywhere should beware.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Saturday, June 3 (game #495)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.
